getFieldType

public FieldTypes getFieldType(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
Returns a FieldType based on the HTML data of the node.

Parameters:
n - Node object to return FieldType
Returns:
value from FieldType enum relating HTML form field type of n

takeAction

public com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage takeAction(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage page,
                                                              com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode context,
                                                              FieldTypes ft,
                                                              java.lang.String action)
                                                       throws BadDataException,
                                                              java.io.IOException
This method takes an action on a page, including any relevant javascript events listening for said action. Inputs text. Simulates typing, rather than cutting and pasting. Typing '\n' submits the corresponding form for many elements associated with fields

Parameters:
page - page to perform the action on
context - the context node (upon which to take the action)
ft - type of the context node
action - action string of action
Returns:
the page input parameter after the action has occurred
Throws:
BadDataException - if malformed action token
java.io.IOException - if IO error occurs

takeAction
